test data:
Case1: correct input
01 01 1990, 02 01 1990
01 01 2000, 12 12 2010
01 01 1990,12 12 2010

Case2: input with wrong formate
01 2000, 12 12 2010
01 01 2000, 12 2010
01-01-1990,12-12-2010

Case3: input year not in range 1900-2010
01 01 1899, 12 12 2011
01 01 1900, 12 12 2012
01 01 1899, 12 12 2010
